alert.note: Alert for Rota (Marianas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued May 24 at 9:08PM ChST until May 25 at 6:00PM ChST by NWS Guam
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH NOW IN EFFECT THROUGH THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...Guam. Rota. * WHEN...Through Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in considerable flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Creeks and streams may rise out of their banks. Flooding may occur in poor drainage and urban areas. Extensive street flooding and flooding of creeks and rivers are possible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Typhoon Mawar is now moving through Guam and Rota waters. This will maintain the risk of heavy rainfall and flash flooding for Guam and Rota through at least 10 AM, Thursday. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.
